On August 27, 2025, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) announced the formation of a new Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Services Transformation unit .

Key details of the announcement include:

Purpose: The new unit is designed to consolidate TCS's existing AI teams and capabilities into a single entity. The strategic move emphasizes the company's commitment to prioritizing AI for future growth by delivering specific solutions and accelerating innovation across different industries.

Leadership: The new unit will be headed globally by Amit Kapur, who previously led the company's UK and Ireland business. His appointment as Chief AI and Services Transformation Officer will be effective September 1, 2025.

Operational structure: Kapur will report directly to Aarthi Subramanian, TCS President and Chief Operating Officer. The unit will work closely with other service units and business groups within the company to scale the application of AI and data capabilities across its service offerings.
